snippet: The rookie Javier Baez homered and drove in four runs two days after hitting a home run in his major league debut.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Chicago Cubs beat Colorado Rockies, 6-2; other MLB scores noted.
lead_paragraph: The rookie Javier Baez homered and drove in four runs two days after hitting a home run in his major league debut.

headline.main: Cubs Rookie Homers Twice in Victory Over Rockies
